title: Communication Mastery
subtitle: Say what you mean, hear what they're saying
description: Learn to communicate in ways that create connection instead of distance. This course covers speaking authentically, listening deeply, navigating difficult conversations, and expressing needs without attack or blame.

modules.title: Needs and Requests
modules.description: Asking for what you need effectively

modules.title: Repair Conversations
modules.description: Coming back after communication breaks down

whatYouLearn: Understand why communication often creates distance
Speak authentically without blame or attack
Listen in ways that make others feel understood
Express needs and make clear requests
requirements: Willingness to change how you communicate

questions.question: What causes most communication to fail?
options: Speaking from reactivity, listening to respond rather than understand

questions.question: What does 'speaking authentically' require?
options: Expressing your truth while owning your experience rather than blaming

questions.question: What is the difference between listening to respond and listening to understand?
options: Understanding focuses on receiving their experience; responding focuses on preparing your reply

questions.question: What helps navigate difficult conversations?
options: Regulating first, staying curious, taking breaks when flooded

questions.question: What is the difference between a need and a strategy?
options: Needs are universal (connection, autonomy); strategies are specific ways to meet them

questions.question: What makes an effective repair conversation?
options: Acknowledging impact, taking responsibility, and expressing care for the relationship
Moving on without talking about it
